conversation.translated_utterance: I think swimming is relatively easy! There are many places where general swimming competitions have free admission, and for the athletes' competitions, I think I just bought tickets at the entrance instead of going through the ticketing process, haha.

저는 4년정도 다닌 것 같아요!
원래 이렇게 길게 다닐 생각은 없었는데 수영을 다니다 안 다니니까 살이 엄청 쪄서... ㅎㅎ 다른 운동으로는 수영밥 살이 안 빠지더라고요ㅠㅠ

conversation.translated_utterance: Do you have any pets?

conversation.utterance: 아 본가에 있으시군요 집안에 같이 있어요?
conversation.translated_utterance: Oh, so it's at your parents' house? Is it living with them?

Yes, I sent away a Shih Tzu two years ago, and then I sent away a Maltese after that.
I sent a cat not long agoㅠㅠ
Oh no, you've sent quite a few animals, haven't you?
You must have felt really bad.

conversation.utterance: 거의다 유기견 유기묘 데려다 키웠는데 다 나이먹어서 하늘나라로ㅠ
conversation.translated_utterance: I raised mostly abandoned dogs and cats, but they all grew old and went to heaven.
Now I have one left, and its name is name3.

conversation.utterance:
그래도 나이들어서가는거라도 그간정이 들었을텐데 
키우시는거 엄청 귀찮으실텐데도 잘키우시네요
conversation.translated_utterance: Still, even though they are getting old and passing away, they must have brought you joy during their time. It must be really bothersome to take care of them, but you do it so well.

conversation.utterance: 남들처럼 애지중지 미용시키고 맛난거 사서먹이고 그런건 잘 못하지만 애정갖고 키웠죠
conversation.translated_utterance: I may not be able to pamper them like others do with grooming and buying them tasty treats, but I raised them with love.
Name3 is also on the verge of it today or tomorrow.
I think name3 will be cute; even the name sounds adorable.
Oh, name3 is quite old too.

conversation.utterance: 엄마랑 아들 안락사시키라는거 불쌍해서 데려왔는데 아들이 먼저갔네요
conversation.translated_utterance: I brought them because I felt sorry for the mom and son being euthanized, but the son went first.
Due to the mother's negligence, there was a rupture in the intestines. 😢

conversation.utterance:
그래도 부모님께서 좋은일하시네요
유기견 유기묘 데려다가 잘키우시고
conversation.translated_utterance: It's nice that your parents are doing good things by taking in and raising abandoned dogs and cats.
It breaks my heart to send them away, so they said they won't raise any more.

conversation.utterance: 그러실것같아요 그래도 또 유기견보시면 마음이 편치않으셔서 데려오실듯요
conversation.translated_utterance: I think that's likely, but if they see another stray dog, they probably won't be able to help but take it in.
That's right, they have a soft heart and tend to take them in because they feel sorry for them.

conversation.utterance: 그래도 name2님 댁에서 하늘나라간 아이들은 복받았네요 좋은곳에서 편히 잘 있다가게되니~
conversation.translated_utterance: Still, the pets that went to heaven from your home are lucky; they get to be in a good place and rest comfortably.
